> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> Nightlight nodded and looking at Dark Rodimus said "How longer should I
> remain inside... This Place?"said the femme who wasnt sure if was a ship or
> a base"when will be allowed to be outside, even if that means just few
> minutes?"
>
> The oppresive enviroment started to deppress her, she missed to feel the
> wind and the sunlight.

<NEW>

DARK RODIMUS continued to watch TUSCON on the viewscreen for a few
moments longer, he could see him talk to BIG CONVOY and the others who
were part of that team. "Fool." He said quietly. "I knew Tuscon would
attempt to ally himself with them."

There was a dark chuckle as DARK RODIMUS shifted the view of his
screen and now a view of the jungle could be seen. The large shape of
SLUDGE and SNARL in their rather impressive beast modes walked past
the camera. GRIMLOCK, also in beastmode,  stopped and looked at the
camera and roared, and then kept on moving.

DARK RODIMUS looked up at NIGHTLIGHT, "I would not ever want you to
leave my side." he said, a strange earnestness in his voice, his otics
glowing slightly as they looked at the female that stood before him.

(TAG)

Preston
